{{cpp/container/vector_bool/title|flip}}
{{cpp/container/vector_bool/navbar}}
{{ddcla|header=vector|constexpr=c++20|
void flip();
}}

Toggles each {{c/core|bool}} (replaces with its opposite value) in the {{rlp|/|vector}}.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;vector&gt;

void print(const std::vector&lt;bool&gt;&amp; vb)
{
    for (const bool b : vb)
        std::cout &lt;&lt; b;
    std::cout &lt;&lt; '\n';
}

int main()
{
    std::vector&lt;bool&gt; v{0, 1, 0, 1};
    print(v);
    v.flip();
    print(v);
}
|output=
0101
1010
}}
